weekly_summary: Ayşe, your commitment to improving your scores is evident across all subjects, particularly in Türkçe, Temel Matematik, and AYT Matematik, showing remarkable progress. However, it's crucial to address the slight decline in AYT Kimya, ensuring a balanced improvement across all areas. This week's focus will be on elevating your Kimya understanding, reinforcing Fizik concepts, and maintaining your strengths in other subjects. Your dedication is paying off, and with a strategic approach this week, we aim to achieve comprehensive excellence.

tasks.subject: AYT Kimya
tasks.focus: Review basic concepts and tackle problem areas.

tasks.subject: AYT Fizik
tasks.focus: Focus on weak topics from the last exam.

tasks.subject: AYT Biyoloji
tasks.focus: Revise and deepen understanding of recent chapters.

tasks.subject: AYT Kimya
tasks.focus: Advanced problem solving and reaction mechanisms.

tasks.subject: AYT Fizik
tasks.focus: Work on application questions and experimental methods.

tasks.subject: Rest & Review
tasks.focus: Go over this week's work and rest.
